contentrichtext.text: :''This is a concise quick-reference of the most commonly used edit summary abbreviations. For a detailed explanation of these legends, see: Wikipedia's [[Wikipedia:Edit summary legend|Edit summary legend]]''. {| class="wikitable" width="80%" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5"" ! width="22%" | Term ! width="24%" | Abbreviated ! width="54%" | Description |- valign="top" | add | ''+, add, addition'' | Addition of something |- valign="top" | alphabetization | ''alpha, abc'' | Alphabetization of a list |- valign="top" | capitalization | ''cap, capital, cpt, lc, lcase, uc, ucase'' | Fixing of capitalization |- valign="top" | category | ''+cat, -cat, cat, recat, re-cat'' | Addition, subtraction or fixing of a category |- valign="top" | cleanup | ''cl, clean, tidy'' | Many different kinds of small changes in a single edit. |- valign="top" | comment | ''cm, cmt, re'' | Addition of comment or reply |- valign="top" | copyedit | ''cpyed, ced, c/e, ce'' | Copy edit |- valign="top" | creation | ''creation, new'' | Creation of a new article |- valign="top" | disambiguation | ''disambig, disamb, disam, dab, byp disambig'' | Addition of [[Wikipedia:disambiguation|disambiguation]] or removal of ambiguity |- valign="top" | duplication | ''dup, dupe'' | Removal of duplication |- valign="top" | external link | ''EL, xl, ext lk, ext lks, ext lnk, ext lnks, ext link, ext links, URL, http'' | Addition of external links |- valign="top" | formatting | ''fm, fmt, frmt, MoS, mos, MOS'' | Formatting, per [[Wikipedia:Manual of Style|Manual of Style]] |- valign="top" | short new text (full text) | ''ft'' | Addition of short new text, which is fully given in this edit summary |- valign="top" | grammar | ''gr, gm, grmr'' | Fixing grammar |- valign="top" | headers | ''head, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6'' | Fixing header markup or changing header wording |- valign="top" | interwiki | ''iwk, iw'' | Addition of interwiki links (between Wikimedia projects) |- valign="top" | links | ''lk'', ''lks'', ''lnk'', ''ln'', ''wikilink'', ''wl'' | Addition of internal (Wikipedia) links |- valign="top" | merge | ''mrg, mrgd, merged in'' | Article merge |- valign="top" | miscellaneous | ''misc'' | Use only when a more specific and more useful edit summary is not practical. |- valign="top" | move | ''mv, mov'' | Article move |- valign="top" | null edit | ''null, nx, Ã¸'' | Saving the page without changing anything, see [[Help:Dummy edit#Null edit|Null edit]]. |- valign="top" | punctuation | ''punc, punct, pct'' | Fixing punctuation |- valign="top" | redirect | ''rd, rdr, redir'' | Article redirect. Specify what article it redirects to. |- valign="top" | redirect fix | ''snap dbl rdr, fix redir'' | "Snapping" a double redirect: turning a double redirect into a single redirect. |- valign="top" | references | ''ref, refs'' | Adding or fixing source citation. |- valign="top" | remove/delete | ''-, rm, rmv, del'' | Removal of something |- valign="top" | revert | ''rv, rvt, rvrt'' | Revert to a previous edit |- valign="top" | talk | ''see talk'' | Explanation of edit on the article's [[Wikipedia:Talk page|Talk page]] |- valign="top" | spelling | ''sp, typo, typos'' | Fixing of [[typo]]s or incorrect spelling. |- valign="top" | wikify | ''wfy, wky, wkfy'' | Formatting using [[wiki markup]] (as opposed to plain text or [[HTML]]) and add [[Wikipedia:internal link|internal link]]s to material, incorporating it into the whole of Wikipedia |} <noinclude> [[Category:Wikipedia features|Edit summary legend:Quick reference]] [[Category:Wikipedia page history help]] [[Category:Wikipedia basic information]] </noinclude>
